^event_target:.*$.todo: Somehow determine which type of scope this is...

region_for_scope_province.todo: figure out what this does? add to wiki

variable_arithmetic_trigger.description: Can use variable effects and triggers to compare or change and compare modifier and trigger values. "variable_arithmetic_trigger" sections can include more "variable_arithmetic_trigger" sections. This has to be done for effects such as "change_variable" or effects of "if" sections inside the "variable_arithmetic_trigger", since the game may crash otherwise.
variable_arithmetic_trigger.comment: Only validates structure of the arithmetic trigger, not any of the values.

province_is_on_an_island.description: If the province is on an island

has_supply_depot.description: Returns true if there is a supply depot in the province.

has_pasha.description: Returns true if there is a pasha in the province.

religion_group.description:
Returns true if the country/province has religion group X.
Note: Within province scope religion = secondary returns true if the province religion matches the secondary/syncretic religion of the owner.

country_or_non_sovereign_subject_holds.description: If province is held by tag or scope, or any of its non-tributary subjects.

owner_is_colonial_nation.description: If the owner of the province is a colonial nation

custom_trigger_tooltip.description: Hides the enclosed condition so that it is still required but cannot be seen by human players and displays the specified tooltip in its place.

calc_true_if.description: Returns true if at least amount number of targets within the specified scope match the specified conditions

hidden_trigger.description: Hides the enclosed conditions so that they are still required but cannot be seen by human players.

is_religious_center_province.description: If the province contains a religious center

has_latent_trade_goods.description: If the province has latent (undiscovered) trade goods.

tolerance_to_this.description: Returns true if the country has a tolerance of at least X towards the religion of the country or scoped province.

area.description: Returns true if the province is part of the area X.

artillery_in_province.description: Returns true if there are artillery units from the specified country in the province.

base_manpower.description: Returns true if the base manpower of the province is at least X.

base_production.description: Returns true if the base production of the province is at least X.

base_tax.description: Returns true if the base tax of the province is at least X.

can_build.description: Returns true if the specified building can be built in the province.

can_spawn_rebels.description: Returns true if the specified rebel faction is a valid rebel faction of the province.

cavalry_in_province.description: Returns true if there are cavalry units from the specified country in the province.

colonial_region.description: Returns true if the province is part of the colonial region X.

colonysize.description: Returns true if colony is at least size X.

construction_progress.description: Returns true if the construction progress is at least X%.

continent.description: Returns true if the province is located on continent X.

controlled_by.description: Returns true if the province is controlled by X.

country_or_vassal_holds.description: Returns true if the province is part of the specified country or its subjects.

culture.description: Returns true if the province culture is X.

culture_group.description: Returns true if the country/province has a culture of the specified culture group.

current_institution_growth.description: Returns true, if the country/province has an institution growth of at least X for the first not embraced institution.

devastation.description: Returns true if the devastation of the province is at least X.

development.description: Returns true if the development of the province is at least X.

fort_level.description: Returns true if the fort in the province has at least level X.

galleys_in_province.description: Returns true if there are galleys from the specified country in the province.

garrison.description:
Returns true if the garrison is at X men.
Note: The localisation is misleading.

had_province_flag.description: Returns true if the province flag X was last set for the province at least Y days ago.

has_building.description: Returns true if there is the specified building in the province.

has_cardinal.description: Returns true if the province has a cardinal in the curia.

has_climate.description: Returns true if the province has climate X.

has_colonist.description: Returns true if scoped province has an active colonist

has_construction.description:
Returns true if there is the specified construction in progress in the province.
Possible values are core, culture, building, merchant, diplomat, missionary, army, navy, canal, great_project etc.

has_discovered.description: Returns true if the country X has discovered the province.

has_empty_adjacent_province.description:
Returns true if an adjacent province is uncolonized.
Warning: Works only with 'yes'.

has_estate.description: Returns true if the province is controlled by the estate X, or if it has any or none (yes / no).

has_great_project.description: Returns true if the country has the specified great project.

has_heir_leader_from.description: Returns true if an army in the province is led by an heir from X.

has_influencing_fort.description: Returns true if the province has an influencing fort.

has_local_modifier_value.description: Returns true if the value of the specified modifier is at least X for the province.

has_merchant.description: Returns true if the scoped country has an active merchant in the trade node.

has_missionary.description: Returns true if the province has an active missionary.

has_most_province_trade_power.description: Returns true if the country X has most amount of trade power in trade node.

has_owner_accepted_culture.description: Returns true if the culture of the province is accepted by its owner.

has_owner_culture.description: Returns true if the province has the culture of its owner.

has_owner_religion.description: Returns true if the province has the religion of its owner.

has_port.description: Returns true if it is a coastal province.

has_province_flag.description: Returns true if the province has the province flag X.

has_province_modifier.description: Returns true if province has the province modifier X.

has_rebel_faction.description: Returns true if the province is controlled by (the specified) rebel faction.

has_ruler_leader_from.description: Returns true if an army in the province is led by a ruler from X.

has_seat_in_parliament.description: Returns true if the province has a seat in parliament.

has_siege.description: Returns true if the province has siege.

has_state_patriach.description: Returns true, if the province has any state patriarch.

has_terrain.description: Returns true if the province has terrain X.

has_trade_modifier.description: Returns true the specified country has the trade modifier X in the trade node.

has_trader.description: Returns true if the specified country has a merchant in the trade node.

has_winter.description: Returns true if the province has winter X.

heavy_ships_in_province.description: Returns true if there are heavy ships from the specified country in the province.

highest_value_trade_node.description:
Returns true if the trade node is the highest valued trade node in the world.
The value is calculated as total trade value minus outgoing trade value.

infantry_in_province.description: Returns true if there are infantry units from the specified country in the province.

is_backing_current_issue.description: Returns true if the province is backing the current issue in the parliament.

is_blockaded.description: Returns true if the province is blockaded.

is_capital.description: Returns true if the province is a capital.

is_city.description: Returns true if the province is a city, i.e. has a population of at least 1000.

is_claim.description: Returns true if the specified country has a claim on the province.

is_colony.description: Returns true if the province is a colony.

is_core.description: Returns true if the country X has a core on the province.

is_empty.description: Returns true if province is empty

is_in_capital_area.description: Returns true if the province is in the capital area of its owner (i.e. has a land connection to the ownerâ€™s capital through whose provinces).

is_institution_origin.description: Returns true if the province is the origin of the specified institution.

is_island.description: Returns true if the province is an island, i.e. has no neighboring land province and no reachable province via a strait.

is_looted.description: Returns true if the province is looted.

is_node_in_trade_company_region.description: Returns true, if the province's trade node is in a trade company region.

is_overseas.description: Returns true if the province is overseas

is_owned_by_trade_company.description: Returns true if the province belongs to a trade company.

is_part_of_hre.description: Returns true if the country/province is part of the HRE.

is_permanent_claim.description: Returns true if the province is a permanent claim of X.

is_prosperous.description: Returns true if the province is prosperous. NOTE: Does not have a tooltip.

is_religion_grant_colonial_claim.description: Returns true if the province has been granted to any country, to no country or to a specific country.

is_sea.description:
Returns true if the province is sea.
Mostly used for trade nodes.

is_state.description: Returns true if the province is in a state.

is_state_core.description: Returns true if the country X has a state core on the province.

is_statists_in_power.description: Returns true if in the country the statists are in power.

is_strongest_trade_power.description: Returns true if the specified country has the most trade power in the area.

is_territorial_core.description: Returns true if the country X has a territorial core on the province.

is_territory.description: Returns true if the province is in a territory.

is_wasteland.description: Returns true if the province is wasteland.

island.description: Returns true if the province is an island, i.e. has no neighboring land provinces.

light_ships_in_province.description: Returns true if there are light ships from the specified country in the province.

likely_rebels.description: Returns true if the province has the specified rebel faction as likely rebels.

local_autonomy.description: Returns true if the province has a local autonomy of at least X.

local_autonomy_above_min.description: Returns true, if the province's local autonomy is at least X above the local development's minimun value.

months_since_defection.description: Returns true if the province defected within the last X months.

nationalism.description: Returns true if province has at least X years of separatism remaining.

native_ferocity.description: Returns true if ferocity of natives in the province is at least X.

native_hostileness.description: Returns true if hostileness of natives in the province is at least X.

native_size.description: Returns true if size of natives in the province is at least X.

num_free_building_slots.description: Returns true if the province has at least X building slots remaining.

num_of_times_improved.description: Returns true if the development of the province was improved at least X times.

num_of_units_in_province.description: Returns true if the specified country has at least X units of the specified type in the province. (type and who are not needed, if not included will default to all.)

owned_by.description: Returns true if the province is owned by the country X.

previous_owner.description: Returns true if the previous owner of the province was X.

privateer_power.description: Returns true if the country has at least X trade power from privateering in the trade node.

province_distance.description: Returns true, if the distance between specified provinces is at least X.

province_group.description: Returns true if the province belongs to the specified province group.

province_id.description: Returns true if the province has the ID X.

province_trade_power.description: Returns true if trade power generated by the province is at least X.

pure_unrest.description: Returns true if the province has a base unrest of at least X.

range.description: Returns true if the province is within the range of the specified country.

region.description: Returns true if the province is part of the region X.

religion.description:
Returns true if the country/province has religion X.
Note: Within province scope religion = secondary returns true if the province religion matches the secondary/syncretic religion of the owner.

same_continent.description: Returns true, if specified provinces are on the same continent. If used in country scope, capitals are checked.

sieged_by.description: Returns true if the province is being besieged by country X.

superregion.description: Returns true if the province belongs to the superregion X.

trade_company_size.description: Returns true if the trade company has at least X provinces.

trade_goods.description: Returns true if the province is producing the trade good X.

trade_range.description: Returns true if the trade node is within the trade range of the specified country.

trade_share.description: Returns true if the country controls at least X% of the trade in the specified trade node.

transports_in_province.description: Returns true if there are transports from the specified country in the province.

unit_has_leader.description:
Returns true if any unit is in the province has a leader.
Warning: Works only with 'yes'.

unit_in_battle.description: Returns true if any unit in the province is in a battle.

unit_in_siege.description: Returns true if any unit in the province is in a siege.

units_in_province.description: Returns true if the specified country has units in the province, or the total number of units is larger than X.

unrest.description: Returns true if the unrest in the province is at least X.

institutions.description: Returns true if the support for the specified institution in the province is at least X.
